```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## Load library
library(data.table)
library(ST.auto.1)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
## Set knitr options
opts_chunk$set(
	fig.width = 10,
	fig.height = 6,
	echo = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
```

## R Markdown

TO analyse individual models copy the model name 
```{r}
model_1<- list(LHS="DR", RHS=c("avg_oil_pri_barrel_lag_3","avg_oil_pri_barrel_lag_2"))
t<-reporter(model_1)
        
```

See results of individual models. This is not made pretty, code yet to be brought in for this
```{r echo=FALSE}
t$report_summary
```
See diagnostics test in a pretty format

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
t$report_selectedModelDiagnostics
```

## Charting


```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
t$report_pred_plot

```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
DT::datatable(t(t$report_predicted_df),options = list(scrollX = TRUE))
```
